task.title: How to add SpecFlow into your project
task.shortdesc: Your IDE needs a plugin called SpecFlow in order to functionate properly and red your tests.

prereq.p: Get familiar with what IDE is

context.p: Here you will learn how to add SpecFlow into your project :

step.cmd: In the search box type SpecFlow.
Hit the download button to begin the installation procces

result.p: Your IDE will be able to read your tests
The Blue color of the Given, When, Then means the IDE reads the tests.
